name: Advanced URL v6
description: Advanced URL v6Is for splitting the settingsRegExp, that splits your URL into protocoll, user, password, subdomain, domain, topleveldomain, path, filename, filetype and GET-parameters (with/without value).
author: Timmaeh.de
replace: Protocoll: $1n User: $4n Password: $6n Subdomain: $7n Domain: $10n Domainendung: $11n Path: $12n File: $14n Filetype: $15n GET-Parameters: $17
